introParagraph.text: You can launch a website in just a few days using a constructor or build a complex platform from scratch.
introParagraph.textAnd: — the choice depends on your business goals.

constructor.title: When to choose a constructor:
list: You need a quick launch for an MVP, promo, or landing page
The task is simple: a business card site or portfolio
You plan to update it yourself without developers

development.title: When custom development is worth it:
list: You want full freedom in design, integrations, and architecture
The website should grow with the business
Priority is security, speed, and SEO
subList: This is the choice for those building not just a website, but a growth tool.
